title: client.
body: I keep getting disconnected from the client chat ? My internet is fine and all. Unsure as to why?  Also for only a few days  i have been experiencing what seems to be packet loss lag and i've no clue how to fix. I'll auto someone and sometimes it'll sorta freeze and they'll take damage late or people will use abilities and it wont appear till a year later (lee sin Q) 60fps always and below 50 ping always. No idea what is happening q.q

replies.body: It's a windows service known to cause pvp disconnections and such issues in LoL. You should be able to find a guide online on how to disable it.

Greetings. 

Have you tried disabling the IP Helper Windows service?
what is that my yung Goober?

The health bars and damage stuff updating might not be related to connection issues, but issues within the game itself. Many people have been noticing things like that when their ping is perfectly fine.
